meanings.definition: A novel that subverts traditional narrative conventions.
meanings.sent1: The antinovel I read had a very unconventional storyline.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading the antinovel because it was different from other books.
meanings.sent3: The antinovel made me chuckle with its unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent4: His writing style was like an antinovel, breaking all the rules of storytelling.
meanings.sent5: The antinovel painted a vivid picture of a world turned upside down.

meanings.definition: A work of fiction that challenges the typical structure and plot of a novel.
meanings.sent1: In the library, I found an antinovel that defied all expectations.
meanings.sent2: The antinovel was a refreshing change from the usual stories I read.
meanings.sent3: The antinovel had me laughing at its clever deconstruction of storytelling norms.
meanings.sent4: Her writing was as bold as an antinovel, pushing boundaries and breaking molds.
meanings.sent5: The antinovel left a lasting impression with its unconventional approach to storytelling.
